thread.title: Schools Reopen Across Andhra Pradesh and Telangana
thread.title_full: Schools Reopen Across Andhra Pradesh and Telangana

author: deccanchronicle.com
title: Schools Reopen Across Andhra Pradesh and Telangana
text:
Schools Reopen Across Andhra Pradesh and Telangana Telangana DC Correspondent 12 Jun 2025 12:36 PM IST Schools across the two states buzzed with activity as students returned to classrooms. x Students at Chilakanagar in Uppal. (Photo: X) Hyderabad: Schools in the Telugu states of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana have reopened on Thursday. The reopening has brought a renewed sense of excitement as students, teachers, and parents gear up for the new academic year.
Schools across the two states buzzed with activity as students returned to classrooms, reconnecting with friends and teachers.
( Source : Deccan Chronicle )
